SCTX - Script Source:
SCN mwShrineGhostgateScript

; Shrine of Pride.
; Applied to the tribunal shrine associated with the quest.
; This script is minimally functional and still partly in Morrowind Scripting Language.
; It can be reworked when the Dunmer Temple quests are rebuilt.
; Morrowind bug has been removed.  This should now only take just one soul gem, not as many as five.

short button
short questionState

ref soulGemRef

Begin OnActivate

	if ( questionState == 0 )

		if (Player.GetItemCount SoulGem1Petty1PettySoul > 0) 
			set soulGemRef to SoulGem1Petty1PettySoul			
		elseif (Player.GetItemCount SoulGemEmpty1Petty > 0)
			set soulGemRef to SoulGemEmpty1Petty
			
		elseif (Player.GetItemCount SoulGemEmpty2Lesser > 0)
			set soulGemRef to SoulGemEmpty2Lesser
		elseif (Player.GetItemCount SoulGem2Lesser1PettySoul > 0) 
			set soulGemRef to SoulGem2Lesser1PettySoul
		elseif (Player.GetItemCount SoulGem2Lesser2LesserSoul > 0) 
			set soulGemRef to SoulGem2Lesser2LesserSoul
			
		elseif (Player.GetItemCount SoulGemEmpty3Common > 0)
			set soulGemRef to SoulGemEmpty3Common
		elseif (Player.GetItemCount SoulGem3Common1PettySoul > 0) 
			set soulgemref to SoulGem3Common1PettySoul
		elseif (Player.GetItemCount SoulGem3Common2LesserSoul > 0) 
			set soulGemRef to SoulGem3Common2LesserSoul
		elseif (Player.GetItemCount SoulGem3Common3CommonSoul > 0) 
			set soulGemRef to SoulGem3Common3CommonSoul

		elseif (Player.GetItemCount SoulGemEmpty4Greater)
			set soulGemRef to SoulGemEmpty4Greater
		elseif (Player.GetItemCount SoulGem4Greater1PettySoul > 0) 
			set soulGemRef to SoulGem4Greater1PettySoul
		elseif (Player.GetItemCount SoulGem4Greater2LesserSoul > 0) 
			set soulGemRef to SoulGem4Greater2LesserSoul
		elseif (Player.GetItemCount SoulGem4Greater3CommonSoul > 0) 
			set soulGemRef to SoulGem4Greater3CommonSoul
		elseif (Player.GetItemCount SoulGem4Greater4GreaterSoul) 
			set soulGemRef to SoulGem4Greater4GreaterSoul

		elseif (Player.GetItemCount SoulGemEmpty5Grand > 0)
			set soulGemRef to SoulGemEmpty5Grand
		elseif (Player.GetItemCount SoulGem5Grand1PettySoul > 0) 
			set soulGemRef to SoulGem5Grand1PettySoul
		elseif (Player.GetItemCount SoulGem5Grand2LesserSoul > 0) 
			set soulGemRef to SoulGem5Grand2LesserSoul
		elseif (Player.GetItemCount SoulGem5Grand3CommonSoul > 0) 
			set soulGemRef to SoulGem5Grand3CommonSoul
		elseif (Player.GetItemCount SoulGem5Grand4GreaterSoul > 0) 
			set soulGemRef to SoulGem5Grand4GreaterSoul
		elseif (Player.GetItemCount SoulGem5Grand5GrandSoul > 0) 
			set soulGemRef to SoulGem5Grand5GrandSoul

		else
			set soulGemRef to 0
			
		endif

		if ( soulGemRef != 0 )
			MessageBox "Would you like to donate a Soul Gem and ask for a blessing?" "Yes" "No"
			Set questionState to 1
			Return
		endif

		MessageBox "Here Vivec, Sotha Sil, and Almalexia used many soul gems to create the Ghostfence, an unwavering symbol of Dunmer pride."
		Set questionState to 0

	endif

End


Begin GameMode

	if ( questionState == 1 )

		set button to GetButtonPressed

		if ( button == 1 )
			Set questionState to 0
			Return
		endif

		if ( button == 0 )

			if (soulGemRef != 0) && (questionState == 1)
				Player.RemoveItem soulGemRef 1
				MessageBox "The Grace of Pride: Thank you for your pride, Lord Vivec. I shall not doubt myself, or my people, or my gods, and shall insist upon them, and my ancient rights."
				Cast 0shrineUghostgateUsp Player  ; Fortify Magicka, Shield
				SetStage fbmwTTSevenGraces 18
				Set questionState to 0
			endif

		endif

	endif

End
;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 396 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>
